mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t21.`ENABLE` AS `PERMISSIONENABLE`, t21.`PERMISSIONTYPE`, t1.`SYS_PERMISSIONID`, t21.`SYS_PERMISSIONNAME`, t1.`SYS_ROLEID`, t11.`SYS_ROLENAME`, t1.`SYS_ROLE_PERMISSIONID`, t1.`UPDATEDATE` FROM `IBZROLE_PERMISSION` t1 LEFT JOIN IBZROLE t11 ON t1.SYS_ROLEID = t11.SYS_ROLEID LEFT JOIN IBZPERMISSION t21 ON t1.SYS_PERMISSIONID = t21.SYS_PERMISSIONID ) t1 where sys_role_permissionid=#{id}
